name: Timeless Racing
description:
Timeless Racing is a car game with 2d arcade controls. Your goal is to collect points by passing other vehicles in the traffic. You can buy new vehicles by collecting points. Have fun... 

Controls:

W - Accelerating 

S - Brake 

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

To be added with updates:

1-Music and sounds.

2-Level mode

3-Mobile version(Google Play)

4-Different game modes

Contact us for comments, suggestions and bugs  :  rustystudio35@gmail.com
